launchpad_s_plus

Class Launchpad

  • java.lang.Object
    • launchpad_s_plus.Launchpad

  • public class Launchpad
extends java.lang.Object
    Determines the connections to the Launchpad S.
    Terminates the program if no Launchpad is connected.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.0 $
    Author:
    Helion

    • Field Summary

      Fields

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Launchpad() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void disableSelfListen()
      Disables self-listening on the Launchpad, meaning pressing any pad on the launchpad will not automatically color the same pad.
      static void enableSelfListen()
      Re-enables self-listening on the Launchpad, meaning pressing any pad will instantly color it with its default value: (Yellow color, strong intensity)
      static boolean found()
      Checks the a Launchpad S is connected
      static javax.sound.midi.MidiDevice getInputDevice()
      Returns the MidiDevice entry representative of the Launchpad S Input port
      static javax.sound.midi.Receiver getOutputDevice()
      Returns the Receiver entry representative of the Launchpad S Output port
      static void startLaunchpad()
      Creates a [9][9] map of int values representing the MIDI notes used by the Launchpad S, then attempts to setup the connections.
      static void stopLaunchpad()
      Clears all pads that may be turned on and closes the connection.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • Launchpad

        public Launchpad()

    • Method Detail

      • disableSelfListen

        public static void disableSelfListen()
        Disables self-listening on the Launchpad, meaning pressing any pad on the launchpad will not automatically color the same pad.
        Use this when you need to implement games or animations that require colors to be displayed and kept even when the user presses it.

      • enableSelfListen

        public static void enableSelfListen()
        Re-enables self-listening on the Launchpad, meaning pressing any pad will instantly color it with its default value: (Yellow color, strong intensity)

      • found

        public static boolean found()
                     throws java.lang.Exception
        Checks the a Launchpad S is connected
        Returns:
        boolean True if the Launchpad has been found, False otherwise
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception

      • getInputDevice

        public static javax.sound.midi.MidiDevice getInputDevice()
        Returns the MidiDevice entry representative of the Launchpad S Input port
        Returns:
        MidiDevice

      • getOutputDevice

        public static javax.sound.midi.Receiver getOutputDevice()
        Returns the Receiver entry representative of the Launchpad S Output port
        Returns:
        Receiver

      • startLaunchpad

        public static void startLaunchpad()
                           throws javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException,
                                  java.lang.InterruptedException,
                                  javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException
        Creates a [9][9] map of int values representing the MIDI notes used by the Launchpad S, then attempts to setup the connections.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.MidiUnavailableException - Midi Unavailable Exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread Interrupted Exception
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Invalid Midi Data Exception

      • stopLaunchpad

        public static void stopLaunchpad()
                          throws javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException,
                                 java.lang.InterruptedException
        Clears all pads that may be turned on and closes the connection.
        Throws:
        javax.sound.midi.InvalidMidiDataException - Invalid Midi Data Exception
        java.lang.InterruptedException - Thread Interrupted Exception
